alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Morongo Basin (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued November 25 at 3:15PM PST until November 26 at 8:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 8 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...First freeze of the season, with sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 degrees possible. * WHERE...In California, Eastern Mojave Desert and Morongo Basin. In Nevada, Lake Mead National Recreation Area, Las Vegas Valley, and Northeast Clark County. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 8 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Morongo Basin
